ph_upload_avatar: Upload robot avatar, recommended size 100x100px, max 100KB
msg_workflow_name_format: Only English, numbers, and characters "_", ".", "-" allowed, max 50 characters
msg_remark_name_tip: For backend display only, max 20 characters
ph_intro_chat: Enter robot introduction, e.g., ChatWiki product help robot, get ChatWiki usage help by asking questions, such as how to create a robot, how to create a knowledge base, how to add models, etc.
ph_intro_workflow: Enter robot introduction, e.g., ZHIMA CHATAI provides ZHIMA CHATAI product help based on large language models
msg_add_llm_provider_title: Please add LLM model provider first?
msg_add_llm_provider_content: Robot chat is based on LLM (Large Language Model), please complete LLM provider configuration first
msg_workflow_name_format_error: Only English, numbers, and characters "_", ".", "-" allowed
